Posts.Content: Hi, Make your neighbor a meal or some muffins and bring it over. You will never regret helping someone or showing love, you may regret looking out your window and doing nothing. All the energy put into worrying and wishing you did not know could be put to positive use. If you offer kindness and she is negative about it then at least you know in your heart your tried.
Posts.Title: She doesn't know I know...what to do??I want to say something...
